name: No Limit Ape
description: "It's been said that the best form of anti-bot is no anti-bot. $NLA is here to test that theory. No limits on buys, sells, or wallet size. Oh, and it's only a 3% tax on all transactions. So sick of all these tax rugs, so we won't be doing that here. 100% of the small tax rate will go to calls and marketing. We're a very experienced team, and can take this to the moon if botters and early buyers behave. Don't act like jeets."
